languages.text: "Мы пережили бунт еретиков, смерть Леди Теодоры, варп выплюнул нас черти куда... Но удивляет тебя, что Лорд-капитан спустил{mf|ся|ась} на нижние палубы? Серьезно?"
"We have survived a heretical mutiny, Lady Theodora's death, the warp spitting us out into grox knows where... and what shocks you is the Lord Captain going down to the lower decks? Seriously?"
languages.original_text: "Мы пережили бунт еретиков, смерть Леди Теодоры, варп выплюнул нас черти куда... Но удивляет тебя, что Лорд-капитан спустил{mf|ся|ась} на нижние палубы? Серьезно?"

languages.text: "Wir haben eine ketzerische Meuterei überlebt, Lady Theodoras Tod, dass der Warp uns Grox weiß wo ausgespuckt hat ... und was Euch entsetzt, ist die Tatsache, dass der Lord Captain auf die Unterdecks geht? Ernsthaft?"
languages.original_text: "We have survived a heretical mutiny, Lady Theodora's death, the warp spitting us out into grox knows where... and what shocks you is the Lord Captain going down to the lower decks? Seriously?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben eine ketzerische Meuterei überlebt, Lady Theodoras Tod, dass der Warp uns Grox weiß wo ausgespuckt hat ... und was Euch entsetzt, ist die Tatsache, dass der Lord Captain auf die Unterdecks geht? Ernsthaft?"

languages.text: « On a survécu à une mutinerie d'hérétiques, à la mort de dame Théodora, aux courants du Warp qui nous ont catapultés je ne sais où... et ce qui vous interpelle, c'est que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ose s'aventurer sur les ponts inférieurs ? Dites-moi que je rêve ! »
languages.original_text: "We have survived a heretical mutiny, Lady Theodora's death, the warp spitting us out into grox knows where... and what shocks you is the Lord Captain going down to the lower decks? Seriously?"

traits.locale_text: « On a survécu à une mutinerie d'hérétiques, à la mort de dame Théodora, aux courants du Warp qui nous ont catapultés je ne sais où... et ce qui vous interpelle, c'est que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ose s'aventurer sur les ponts inférieurs ? Dites-moi que je rêve ! »

languages.text: «Hemos tenido un motín de herejes, lady Theodora ha muerto, la disformidad nos ha escupido en dondequiera que estemos... ¿y lo que te sorprende es que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán vaya a las cubiertas inferiores? ¿En serio?».
languages.original_text: "We have survived a heretical mutiny, Lady Theodora's death, the warp spitting us out into grox knows where... and what shocks you is the Lord Captain going down to the lower decks? Seriously?"

traits.locale_text: «Hemos tenido un motín de herejes, lady Theodora ha muerto, la disformidad nos ha escupido en dondequiera que estemos... ¿y lo que te sorprende es que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán vaya a las cubiertas inferiores? ¿En serio?».

languages.text: 「私達は異端者の反乱、シオドーラ様の死、<歪み>による蜥蜴牛への流出を生き延びてきた…それなのに、ロード・キャプテンが下のデッキに行くことについて驚いているの？本気？」
languages.original_text: "We have survived a heretical mutiny, Lady Theodora's death, the warp spitting us out into grox knows where... and what shocks you is the Lord Captain going down to the lower decks? Seriously?"

traits.locale_text: 「私達は異端者の反乱、シオドーラ様の死、<歪み>による蜥蜴牛への流出を生き延びてきた…それなのに、ロード・キャプテンが下のデッキに行くことについて驚いているの？本気？」

languages.text: “我们遭遇了异端分子的叛乱，遭遇了西奥多拉夫人的死亡，亚空间还把我们吐到了鬼才知道的地方……不过是舰长大人去了趟底层甲板，你怎么就受不了了？不是吧？”
languages.original_text: "We have survived a heretical mutiny, Lady Theodora's death, the warp spitting us out into grox knows where... and what shocks you is the Lord Captain going down to the lower decks? Seriously?"

traits.locale_text: “我们遭遇了异端分子的叛乱，遭遇了西奥多拉夫人的死亡，亚空间还把我们吐到了鬼才知道的地方……不过是舰长大人去了趟底层甲板，你怎么就受不了了？不是吧？”

languages.original_text: "We have survived a heretical mutiny, Lady Theodora's death, the warp spitting us out into grox knows where... and what shocks you is the Lord Captain going down to the lower decks? Seriously?"

languages.text: "Kâfirce bir isyandan, Leydi Theodora'nın ölümünden, groks bilir öteboyut bizi nereye fırlattıysa oradan sağ çıktık ve... Seni şaşırtan, Lord Kaptan'ın alt güvertelere inmesi mi? Ciddi misin?"
languages.original_text: "We have survived a heretical mutiny, Lady Theodora's death, the warp spitting us out into grox knows where... and what shocks you is the Lord Captain going down to the lower decks? Seriously?"
